architectural_notes: For the mission/task fix, do not change any other application functionality beyond ensuring tasks auto-save and display correctly within missions.
known_issues: Mission feature bug: tasks added to a mission are not being automatically saved and/or do not reliably appear inside the mission, especially when reopening an existing mission and adding tasks.

existing_features.title: Fix the Mission detail task auto-save flow so that when a user adds/toggles/removes a task inside an existing mission, the change is reliably persisted to the backend automatically (no manual save required), including after reopening an already-created mission.

Ensure the Mission detail view always renders all tasks that were added to that mission, including tasks added after reopening the mission, by keeping the frontend mission cache/state in sync after successful auto-saves (so the UI never shows an older task list after an update).

Adjust the mission auto-save trigger logic to avoid unintended saves that can overwrite or conflict with freshly loaded mission data, while still saving every user-initiated change to title/tasks (especially when entering an existing mission and then adding a task).

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix mission tasks: when adding a task to a mission it should auto-save; adding tasks to an existing/opened mission should also auto-save; all added tasks must appear within the mission view (no other app behavior changes).

projectName: Fix mission task auto-save and ensure tasks persist/appear when reopening missions
